1.content: how do buffy and faith both get pregnant
1.title: how does it happen

choices: Try to research on their own
12.content:
Faith sat in the bathroom with the baser she pumped it inside of her it felt odd but warm.
Faith and Buffy been wantting a baby for a while so faith decided to surpize Buffy by inseminating herself with sperm Buffy was getting a check up see now was the best time for it. Faith went with a blonde hair green eyes doner.
Buffy laid in bed in the hospital her docter removed her head from buffys lower body.
It was done it felt kinda weird but faith wanted a baby and fait got what she wantted Buffy wantted to surpize her so she had a docther inseminat her with sperm.
Buffy went with a brown hair brown eyes sperm doner.
The slayer lovers been together for three years and marrid for one of their three.
After the fall of sunnydale Buffy was lonely and sad and faith was with wood but that didn't last and faith kicked him to the curb after only a few days.
One day faith found Buffy in the slayer HQ training room crying.
Buffy told her how she felt about spikes death and how she would never find love.
Faith then kissed Buffy and after that there was fighting love making more fighhting then at some point they became a couple.
After two years of dating they got marrid it was a small wedding just the scooby gang and a few choice junior slayers.
The wedding theme was pink and black Buffy wear a pink dress faith wear a black suit with pink pin stirpes pink flower and a pink dress shirt.

Now weeks after the insemination each slayer was in a bathroom of their house peeing on a stick.
Both slayers were running with the test sticks in there hands.
Faith I got a surpize for you Buffy yell running with the stick.
B your notvgonna beleve thi faith said running with her own stick.
The slayers run into each other hitting heads geting up they look at each other.
I'm pregnant they both said at the same time.
Buffy: what !
Faith: huh !
Buffy: faith i went and got inseminated and now I'm pregnant.
Faith: well B were starting to think alike couse I did the same thing.
Buffy started to giggle wow what a messe we got ourselfs into Buffy said.
Faith smiled Yeah B wasn't really planin on two rug rats can't say it's not welcome.
Buffy: oh my god what if it's more then two what if we both have twains.
Faith: the more the marrier wait oh shit B what if were caring more like what if were caring three or four each we don't know much about slayer pregnancy.
Buffy: we need to research this
12.title: Slayers think a like

121.content:
hello Giles Buffy said holding the phone with her right hand.
Giles: hello Buffy how's everybody
Buffy: were all ok for the most part
Buffy goes on to tell the whole story of her and faiths issue.
Giles: well that's a first hold on for a bit I have to get a book.
Buffy waits a few minutes then Giles returns on the line.
Giles: ah here we go it's in the watchers hand book it's rare that slayers get pregnant but they do and this book should tell us what we need.
Buffy: there's a watchers hand book and I didn't know about it first the slayers hand book now this one.
Giles: Buffy back to the matter at hand being that your an adult we can skip the slayer teen pregnancy stuff and move on to more useful infomation like how it's rare for a slayer to care one child at a time most slayers have carry two or more children at a time they can Carie up to six babies at once and one slayer in the 60s was pregnant with 12 children at once.
Buffy: holy crap what did faith and I get ourselves into 12 babies were gonna big huge.
Giles: Buffy relax that was one slayer but being that you both will have most likely have twains you will have your hands full.
Buffy: you said it Giles is there anything else we need to know?
Giles: yes if your children are female they will be slayers too and if they are male it's 50 50 that they may have some powers or skills wood has some good combat skills now if that's from training or not we may never know.
Also Buffy I don't think your gonna like this but slayer babies are often bigger then most babies so you and faith maybe gaining more weight at a faster speed then most women.
Buffy: crap were gonna be cows well that sux thank you Giles I have to tell faith were gonna need a farmer soon.
Giles: yes well congases on the children and tell faith I said hello now goodbye Buffy.
121.title: Call giles

1212.content:
It was a month later and both girls were a litle over a month along and both starting to show.
Sadly for Buffy she was showing more then faith Buffy's pants were getting tigher by the day and faith just looked a little bloated.
But faith was having bad morning sickness and Buffy only hade it once.
We now join Buffy in her bedroom she is trying to get her pants closed.
Dumb big baby maving me fat already Buffy said giving up and pulling her pants off and outing a sreachy skirt on even that was getting a little snug.
B stop your bitching I just sent my dinner down the john I would trade with you anyday said faith.
1212.title: A month later

info.description:
ok so this is a female slash fanfic Buffy and faith are a couple and both some how get pregnant very few rules there is no spike normally I’m a spuffy fan but because this is a Buffy faith story there should be no spike keep it tv-14 sex is welcome but keep it light
No Turing them into odd things once they give birth they have to go back to a more normal weight but they dont have to be as skinny as they wore

that’s about it for the rules now have fun your welcome to fill them up with as many babies has you want give them big boobs giant asses a pot belly I don’t care
